document_data.mainbody:
ouse Aielfor was a drow house active in the midâ€“14 century DR.
Several members of the little-known drow house were captured by a solar known as the the Winged to be sent to Thay in 1369 DR. There, the drow were forced to participate in Dennatons gladiatorial battles against other captives. Among the members of the house sent to the Red Wizards arena were several male warriors, a wizard, and even a priestess. The drow were killed when they were set against the Champion of Baeloths Pits.
